thread.title: Chipper Jones rips Los Angeles Dodgers' Chase Utley's dirty slide vs. Mets
thread.title_full: Chipper Jones rips Los Angeles Dodgers' Chase Utley's dirty slide vs. Mets

author: Brendan Kuty | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: Chipper Jones rips Los Angeles Dodgers' Chase Utley's dirty slide vs. Mets
text:
Chipper Jones rarely muzzles himself on Twitter these days, in the wake of Chase Utley's dirty slide that broke Ruben Tejada's leg , the retired future Hall of Famer couldn't help himself. That was not a slide and that is not how u 'go in hard'! â€” Chipper Jones (@RealCJ10) October 11, 2015 
The former Atlanta Braves third baseman also retweeted this: MLB ruling; You're allowed to break Ruben Tejada's leg but not Buster Posey's. 
PLUS: How will the Mets replace Tejada? 
Utley's late slide broke Tejada's right fibula. The Mets shortstop won't play again this season. 
The play helped the Dodgers tie Saturday's game at 2-all before they won, 5-2, to even the National League Division Series at 1-1.
